Package io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.numeric_analysis.newton

Class KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver

java.lang.Object
io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.numeric_analysis.ApproximateEquationSolver
io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.numeric_analysis.newton.NewtonMethodSolver
io.github.ydlv.javadoc_gh_pages_example.math.numeric_analysis.newton.KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver
public class KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver extends NewtonMethodSolver
Uses a known derivative to solve for the root of a function using Newton's method, when the derivative is known and is provided by the user

  • Field Details

    • derivative

      public final RealFunction derivative
      This function is provided by the user upon initialization. It should be the derivative of the function for which to find a root.

  • Constructor Details

    • KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver

      public KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver(RealFunction function, RealFunction derivative, double accuracy, double x0)
      Creates an instance of KnownDerivativeNewtonSolver
      Parameters:
      function - the function for which to find a root
      derivative - the derivative of the function
      accuracy - an upper bound on the difference between the real root and the approximate root
      x0 - the initial guess

  • Method Details

    • derivative

      protected double derivative(double x)
      Calculates the derivative of the function using the function that is provided by the user upon initialization.
      Specified by:
      derivative in class NewtonMethodSolver
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the point where we want to calculate the derivative
      Returns:
      the approximate derivative
